Atlan tag definitions overview - Developer
Skip to content
Atlan tag definitions overview
Â¶
Tags managed in Atlan are structurally very simple:
A name
An (optional) description
An icon (or image)
A color
Through Atlan's APIs, you can
create your own tags
programmatically.
Once the structures exist, you can then also
tag assets
.
